marklogic.body: That's the stench of fear. Ever since the Civil War they've had newspapers owners & demagogues & irrational fear mongering over yer commie infiltrators & ad men's sloganeering & irrational fear mongering over yer brown types & the news cycle & wank tanks & irrational fear mongering over yer Mooslim turtists & yer Mexkin yard workers takin' away their kids' god-given rights to a Spot in MIT Physics & Harvard Law, all beavering away 24/7 in perfume factories to cover up that stench of fear. And in the result, we get this band of botherers, these cliff-hanging meme-making screaming meme-ing blunt tools of Big Business-manipulated blunt tool zombies, Shouting that because the First Amendment gives them the right to speak, it somehow gives them the right to stop everyone else's right to speak, & the right to speak the most magical inanity imaginable & have it 'respected'.
